subject: INDICATING THIS CODE (FRBNYATM
body:
INDICATING THIS CODE (FRBNYATM-2024) YOUR FUND $11.1MILLION DOLLARS. OFFICIAL NOTICE: this is to notify you that Several of meetings have been held this week with the Secretary General of the United Nations Organization United State of America, which ended last Month being 30th of January 2023. It’s obvious that you have not received your fund which is now in the amount of $11.1 million dollars as a compensation refunds to you due to past corrupt governmental officials who almost held your fund to themselves for their selfish reasons and some individuals who have taken advantage of your fund all in an attempt to swindle your fund which has led to unnecessary delay in the receipt and so many losses from your end with them. The national central bureau of interpol enhanced by the united nations and federal bureau of investigation FBI have successfully finalize to boost the exercise of clearing all foreign debts owed to you who have been found not to have received their compensation refunds. My question is how would you like to receive your benefited funds? we have three Method of payment which is either through mailing of Cheque, bank to bank direct transfer or delivering of ATM master card.If you choose to receive your fund through ATM master card then we will be issuing you a custom pin based ATM card which you will use to withdraw up to $10,000.00 per day from any ATM machine that has the Master Card Logo on it and the card have to be renewed in 5 years time which will happened in 2028. Also with the ATM card you will be able to transfer your funds to your local bank account. Even if you do not have a bank account, the ATM card comes with a handbook to enlighten you about how to use it. If you choose to receive your fund through bank to bank transfer then you have to provide your bank account details where your fund will be transferred to you within 6 hours. Lastly If you prefer to receive your fund through Cheque then we will issued a Cheque in your name and you will deposit it in your Bank for it to be cleared within three Working Days. Your payment would be sent to you via any of your preferred option above and would be mailed to you via Post office. 
You will only need to pay $150 for high court of justice certificate of approval. Note: Everything has been taken care of, including Tax, security agencies, custom papers, airport management clearance and home land security and clearance duty. For immediate release of your fund valued at $11.1 million dollars, you should contact our correspondent. Your full name:_________________________ Your house address:______________________ ___ Home/Cell/Phone number:___________________ 
Choose one preferable payment method (ATM master Card, Cheque or through bank transfer. Note That Because Of Impostors, We’re hereby issued you our code of conduct which is (FRBNYATM- 2024). So you have to indicate this code when replying back to us by using It as your subject. Best regards Taylah Walk. contact this email(
intenationalmonetanyfundimf@gmail.com
)

subject: Re: INDICATING THIS CODE (FRBNYATM
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund, I must say! 

Before we proceed, could you please explain a bit more about how this fund came into existence? And why has it been assigned to me specifically? I'm just trying to understand the whole situation better.

Also, could you clarify what the high court of justice approval is and why it's necessary for me to pay for it?

As for the payment method, I think I would prefer the ATM Master Card option. It sounds convenient and easy to use. But again, I'd like some more details on how this process works.

Looking forward to your response!

P.S: Please note that due to privacy concerns, I won't be able to provide my full name, address or phone number at this stage. Once everything is clear and we move forward with the process, we can discuss these details in a secure manner.

Best wishes,
David
